description: To receive your free copy of the whitepaper directly to your inbox, please provide the following information:
firstNamePlaceHolder: Input your first name in here
firstNameInvalidErrorMessage: Please insert a valid first name
lastNamePlaceHolder: Input your last name in here
lastNameInvalidErrorMessage: Please enter a valid last name.
emailInvalidErrorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
companyNamePlaceholder: Input your first company name in here
jobTitlePlaceholder: Input your job title in here
jobInvalidErrorMessage: Please enter a valid job title.
whitepaperAgreement: I agree to be contacted by 4i Tech regarding this white paper.
newsletterAgreement: I agree to subscribe to 4i Tech`s newsletter for updates and insights.
privacyStatement: Privacy Statement: Rest assured that your information is safe with us. We respect your privacy and will never share or sell your data. By downloading this whitepaper, you also agree to receive occasional updates and valuable insights from us related to software development and industry trends. You can unsubscribe at any time.
anyQuestionDescription: If you have any questions or would like to discuss your software development needs, we would love to hear from you. Our team of experts is ready to provide personalized assistance and find the best solutions for your business. Contact us today to start the conversation.
consentStatement: By transmitting your data, you consent to the processing of your request. You have the right to revoke this consent at any time. Further information about our data processing can be found in our {{privacy policy}}.
tankYouTag: Thank You for Downloading Our White Paper
thankYouTitle: Your white paper download request has been received. We appreciate your interest in our content.
thankYouSubtitle: You will receive an email shortly with a link to download the white paper. In the meantime, feel free to explore more of our resources.
